data.text: @greg_travis This data is finally getting a little media attention. https://t.co/smP4sjWRga

@iHadPotentiaI @mahmudme01 @greg_travis More likely vaxxed kids transmitting and getting. Neg VE in NY (first chart), Iceland (second), Denmark (last, unvaxxed =orange). The last one is hospitalizations in Denmark. https://t.co/8uBaEhKTek

@TaNaishaJ @iHadPotentiaI @greg_travis I think we need to verify if booster or previous vaccine doses helps in spreading virus to unvax kids. From Israel to UK data, it indicates virus spreading due to vaccination during a surge. Kids hospitalization and deaths are pretty new. https://t.co/QvXniAVUl4

@iHadPotentiaI @mahmudme01 @greg_travis Denial of airborne transmission & immune evasion not considered. Airborne precautions (ventilation,  indoor air sanitation, etc.) should be universally applied to protect our under 5s, & yet CDC & other public health "authorities" have inaccurately declared victory over COVID-19.
@mahmudme01 @greg_travis Not if I want to keep my job
